    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractNetwork
    Generic network structure.
    AbstractNetworkSampler
    Abstract base class for network throughput sampling in a simulation environment.
    AbstractNodeFactory
     
    AbstractNodeSampler
    Abstract base class for node sampling within the CNSim engine.
    AbstractTransactionSampler
    A sampler for Transaction objects.
    BeliefEntry
     
    BeliefEntryCounter
     
    CommandLineOption
    Annotation used to define command-line options for the CommandLineParser.
    CommandLineParser
    Parses command line arguments for the CNSim simulator.
    Config
     
    ConfigInitializer
    Initialize Config by combining command line arguments and configuration file settings.
    Debug
    A quick way to way to add, enable and disable debug messages.
    Event
    The Event object for the event-driven simulator
    Event_ContainerArrival
    Event that signifies the arrival of a container (e.g. block) that has been validated by someone else.
    Event_ContainerValidation
    Represents an event of container validation in the simulation.
    Event_NewTransactionArrival
    Represents an event of a new transaction arrival in the simulation.
    Event_Report_BeliefReport
     
    Event_Report_NodeStatusReport
     
    Event_Report_PeriodicReport
     
    Event_Report_StructureReport
     
    Event_SeedUpdate
     
    Event_TransactionPropagation
    Represents an event for transaction propagation in the simulation.
    EventTimeComparator
     
    FileBasedEndToEndNetwork
     
    FileBasedNodeSampler
    Node sampler that reads node characteristics from a CSV file.
    FileBasedTransactionSampler
    Transaction sampler that reads transaction information from a CSV file.
    IMultiSowable
    Interface for objects that can update their seed for random number generation.
    INode
    Represents a network node.
    INode.BehaviorType
    Enumeration for the behavior type of node.
    ISowable
    Interface for objects that can be sown with a seed for random number generation.
    IStructure
    Interface for ledger structure, e.g. a blockchain or a DAG.
    ITxContainer
    Defines the main methods that a transaction containing type must include.
    NetworkFactory
     
    NetworkSamplerFactory
    Factory class for creating instances of AbstractNetworkSampler.
    Node
    Abstract class representing a node in a blockchain network.
    NodeSamplerFactory
    Factory class responsible for constructing and configuring instances of AbstractNodeSampler used in simulation runs.
    NodeSet
    Represents a set of nodes participating in a network
    ProgressBar
     
    RandomEndToEndNetwork
    A network with random connections between nodes.
    Reporter
    Handles all main measurement and reporting for simulations.
    ReportEventFactory
     
    Sampler
    Acts as a container of different kinds of Samplers and offers some basic sampling methods.
    SeedManager
    Manages a circular sequence of random seeds for simulations.
    Simulation
    The central class of any simulation
    StandardNetworkSampler
     
    StandardNodeSampler
    A standard implementation of the AbstractNodeSampler.
    StandardTransactionSampler
    A standard implementation of AbstractTransactionSampler.
    Transaction
     
    Transaction.Type
     
    TransactionGroup
    A list containing various transactions.
    TransactionSamplerFactory
    Factory class responsible for creating instances of AbstractTransactionSampler based on whether a file-based or random sampling strategy is required.
    TransactionWorkload
    Represents a workload of transactions, which can be generated either from a file or using a sampler.
    TxSizeComparator
     
    TxValueComparator
     
    TxValuePerSizeComparator
